entry.title: a conspicuous depiction of a common fly (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that many 15th- and 16th-century European paintings included a conspicuous depiction of a common fly (example pictured)?

entry.title: Sefine Shipyard (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Sefine Shipyard in Turkey built a hybrid-electric ferry for Norway?

entry.title: in 1345 and 1346 the English repeatedly defeated the French in both north and south-west France (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in 1345 and 1346 the English repeatedly defeated the French in both north and south-west France?

entry.title: An Informal History of the Hugos (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Jo Walton's An Informal History of the Hugos, which opines that the Hugo Award has a 69-percent success rate, was itself nominated for a Hugo?

entry.title: Ham House (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Ham House contains a rare Charles I–era cabinet room, created for the display of miniature paintings?

entry.title: Game On (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the debate in "Game On" invokes the beer question?

entry.title: La Venuta (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the bonfires lit on the night of La Venuta recall the miraculous flight of the Holy House of Nazareth to Loreto?

entry.title: R. Nelson Smith (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that chemist R. Nelson Smith replaced his colleague's desk chair with a porcelain toilet?

entry.title: 南北方将迎下半年来最冷清晨：这温度暴降程度真要冻哭 (快科技)

entry.title: 嫌银行态度差男子取500万现金 网友质疑：本人霸气回应 (快科技)

entry.title: 翟志刚“飘了”！太空漫步第一人、宇宙级梗王 (快科技)

entry.title: 《长津湖》成中国影史票房第四：近1亿人观看 你看了吗？ (快科技)
entry.content: 近日全网大火的电影《长津湖》，票房还在一路高涨。 据猫眼专业版数据，10月16日16时14分，《长津湖》 累计票房超46.86亿，正式超过《流浪地球》票房成绩，暂列中国影史票房榜第四名、全球年度

entry.title: 寒潮来袭 出门冻哭了：今晨北京气温创纪录 (快科技)

entry.title: 秋裤穿起来！新一股冷空气要来了：大范围降温 (快科技)
entry.content: 你所在的地方，天气冷吗？ 按照中国天气网发布的消息，预计未来一周，我国大部地区气温仍以偏低为主，需注意保暖。 据中央气象台，今5时较昨5时，东北地区、华北、黄淮、江淮、江南中东部等地
